heroDepositions.title: What Our Clients Are Saying About SUBSEE on

testimonials.desc: The great differentiator with SUBSEE is the native integration with the SUB100 Portal, which allows for the creation of ads with the quality demanded by our marketing department. All generated leads are directed to our CRM in an integrated and fast manner.
testimonials.name: Rafael Garcia

testimonials.desc: The quality of the ad produced by SUBSEE impressed us. The system has specialized language for dealing with rural ads, in addition to allowing the creation of attributes that integrate with georeferenced kml files.
testimonials.name: Alessandro Mendes

testimonials.desc: We have been using SUBSEE since its early versions. However, SUBSEE on impressed all of us due to its mobility and ease of registration. The key loan system is truly revolutionary, leaving our clients surprised with this functionality.
testimonials.name: Valtinez Favarão

heroPlan.title: Plans & Pricing
heroPlan.subtitle: We've designed plans that fit your profile

frequents.title: How will I learn to use SUBSEE?
frequents.desc: Firstly, SUB100 is known by clients for developing systems that are easy and intuitive to use. But if necessary, the SUBSEE system has a learning platform for all modules. Additionally, we conduct monthly collective training sessions, and whenever we update the system, we produce videos introducing the new version's features. If you still face difficulties, you can contact support to address them.

frequents.title: Is it possible to import my data from my system to SUBSEE?
frequents.desc: If your system is capable of exporting information in XML and spreadsheet formats for people's registrations, our team is ready to import your property and contact records into SUBSEE. We are here to assist you.

frequents.title: By using SUBSEE on, do I get discounts for advertising on the SUB100 Portal?
frequents.desc: Yes, SUB100 offers special bundles for using more than one service. You can check the conditions in our Plans & Pricing section or request a quote from our sales team.

frequents.title: Which real estate portals does SUBSEE integrate with?
frequents.desc: SUBSEE integrates with the main Brazilian real estate portals. You can check the list of available portals in my connections. If your preferred portal or business network is not listed, you can request our support team to analyze the feasibility of creating this integration.

frequents.title: Can the ads be inserted into the Facebook Pixel?
frequents.desc: Yes, in addition to the Facebook Pixel, you can insert other keys that allow for the necessary tracking and optimization to make your ad successful in your marketing campaigns and easy to find on Google.

frequents.title: I have a domain. Can I use it for the sites created by SUB100?
frequents.desc: Yes, if you already have a domain for your site, it can be used with SUBSEE on. If you don't have a domain, don't worry, domain registration is simple, inexpensive, and easy to do.

frequents.title: Does SUBSEE on come with a real estate site?
frequents.desc: Yes, SUBSEE on includes a standard real estate site. You just need to choose the desired ad standard, whether for sites predominantly featuring urban properties or for brokers specializing in rural properties.
